name: Mystique Harrison
text: One of my favorite lunch spots! I usually get the pesto garlic cheesy bread and the mushroom soup and both are amazing!!! Their appetizer prices are really good and a great portion for a meal. The one downside with this location is the loud ‚Ä¶More

name: amanda holbrooks
text: Food was DELICIOUS! We got the veg out, Maui wowie and pacific rim and they were all great. Our server Seth was very attentive and friendly...our whole table commented many times on how great his service was.

name: Zoe Porter
text: My boyfriend and I come here all the time. We love the atmosphere, the music, and especially the pizza. They always make sure our food is right (my boyfriend is lactose intolerant) and the service is fantastic. Zach and Rose are two servers that are especially good.

name: William Morgan
text: Despite covid concerns, Mellow has remained a great stop for lunch or dinner. Nice beer selection and drink menu, complimenting the always-stellar eats they have to offer. Half price apps makes a no-brainer out of early dinner, and thd staff always handles to-gos without a hitch.

name: Dylan Reid
text: If your looking for some tasty pizza and some cold beer dont look any further. Get the magical mystery tour and add sausage. (Amazing! And now a hidden menu item)

name: Robbin Adler
text: Clean. Great patio area. Bar. Well decorated. Is always good. Happy Hour monday thru Thursday. Good drink specials and food specials. Great staff.

name: melessia johnson
text: OMG. People have got to try this place. Best hand made pizza I've ever had. Beautiful outside patio dining and top notch service. Will definitely come back

name: Belinda Branson
text: Wow. Good House Special pizza & spinach artichoke dip. Nice atmosphere!!

name: Terri James
text: The waiter was excellent. The chicken salad was exceptional. Been awhile since I have eaten there but I will make this a habit now.

name: Jane Thorne
text: Great pizza and cheese bread! Also great service and very fast!

name: J Keister
text: love the food and the atmosphere  here  waiter was great  I have had pizza at a lot of top name places in my travels for work. Mellow mushrooms  is at the top

name: Bret Rusnak
text: Food is always delicious.  Service is good most of the time.  There are a few servers that could use a little remedial on taking care of the customer.  However, any issue we have ever had the restaurant is quick to remedy any issues by ‚Ä¶More

text: My daughter and I had got a special order pizza and pretzel bitesfrom here and although they were delicious they weren't exactly perfect or fixed to our exact request. The pizza was missing a few of the items we asked to be on it and the ‚Ä¶More

name: Zach West
text: Bartender was great, good job. The only reason I'm giving four stars is because the food took FOREVER to come out.

name: A Harris
text: Always a family favorite! Delicious, great service, great atmosphere!

name: Brian Hunt
text: Had to order my food for takeout. I enjoyed the meatball appetizer. It was one of the best I've ever had at any Mellow Mushroom. I enjoyed a craft IPA to go. Inexpensive and large quantity

name: Taylor Driver
text: Great experience the food was amazing and the waitress was very kind the inside is a good temperature and the outside is calm it's really chill on the inside and brings good vibes over all a amazing experience!üëç Would recommend

name: Mona Lee
text: Reminded me of a slower paced, more relaxed time. Good food, great drinks and nice staff.

name: Watching You
text: The food was good the server was nice very professional BUT I SAY BUT I got desert and ask for a brownie and I got a package that you can buy at Walmart WOW REALLY HOW CHEAP  could you not put it on a small plate it‚Äôs so cheap looking to do ‚Ä¶More

name: B York
text: Delicious food and great service. Loved the thin crust!

name: Angel
text: The service and the found was outstanding. An awesome place it was like going back in time. We absolutely loved it.

name: Jamie Householder
text: One of my favorite pizza joints. Great atmosphere, large tap beer selection, and some of the best pizza you'll ever eat. The Maui Wowie is my favorite, but every on the menu is awesome. The hummus is pretty dang good for a non-Mediterranean restaurant as well.

name: Rob Richardson
text: I love all their pizza; you cannot find a single item on the menu that isn't one of the best you've ever had.  Staff is very friendly, fast and extremely courteous.

name: Julie Lyle Johnson
text: Very clean and they are taking alot of precautions to keep everyone safe. The service and the Hawaiian pizza were outstanding!

name: Teresa Tanner
text: love...Love..LOVE this place!! If u haven't tried it..its a must do!!

name: Annettee Marshall
text: Good place to eat. The food was awesome, even on a crowded Friday night. Loved the meatballs, not so much on the mushroom soup. But, that was probably all on me.

name: Ricky Bennefield
text: I had heard many good things about the  restaurant. Went today with my family. I wasn't impressed. The food  was just ok. Our  waitress was inattentive. I feel like I wasted $50 today.

name: Tommy Honey
text: Very nice place great food and service

name: Melissa C
text: Amazing pizza and pretzel bites!! First time visit.. Waitress was very helpful and courteous

name: Delen Boyd
text: This location has improved 1000 percent simce it was closed and sold 2 years ago. Staff respects the owner and appear very happy to be there. Our salad was a generous portion and well presented. The mighty meaty toppings were very adequate ‚Ä¶More

name: Cathy Shipley
text: Really great food and atmosphere..friendly service

name: Loren Hunter
text: Nice service good food

name: Jessica Thurman
text: Extra love for this place!! We drive from an hour away just to eat here, because it is beyond worth it. The staff is always friendly and very down to earth. They actually mean it when they ask how your day has been.. They‚Äôre usually very ‚Ä¶More

name: Brandon Word
text: Well, where do I start. First, we had to wait 30+ minutes to get seated. That alone isn't bad, since we were a large party. But, there were many other people waiting as well and there was a lot of empty seats that could have sat people. ‚Ä¶More

name: kevohill
text: Pretzel bites and holy shiitake pizza were fantastic. Vegan cheese and Gf dough option makes this place great for  those with dietary restrictions.

name: Adam Williams
text: Excellent food with quality ingredients. I go for for the calzones every time which are HUGE and reasonably priced.  The only reason I docked a star is because I do feel they are a bit on the expensive side for most items, but the quality is definitely there to make it worth it once in a while.

name: Nick Ballard
text: 1st visit good. This time, not good, too tomatoes tasting and too expensive.

name: Melissa Holmes

name: Linda Brandon
text: Delicious food and pleasant outdoor seating.

name: Greg Martin
text: The food was great, and staff very friendly.

name: Julie Pitts
text: Really liked the pizza. We are around lunch time, during the week and there was no crowd. The restaurant was clean and the waitress friendly. I believe they cater to a younger crowd at night and in weekends.

text: Love this place!!! Little pricey though, 8 slices of pizza for $25.00. We always order the House Special.

name: Glenn Priest

name: emily cox

name: Thomas Cumming

name: Michael Adams

text: Enjoyed the pizza and the atmosphere was a bonus. Great place to enjoy a meal.

name: Alicia Acosta
text: My server was great but the quality of the food isn't what it use to be. My server was very helpful with my own mistake in my order but the food didn't taste as good as it use too. So we basically spent $60.00 on food they we didn't like the only thing that tasted okay was the pizza bread.

name: Cristy Woolfolk
text: Pizza was awesome and the service and atmosphere were great.  I just don't like the paper straws. They don't last for your entire meal. That's my only complaint.

text: Pay no attention to the negative reviews; we are from Indiana on our way to Florida and stopped here just from a Google search and were not let down! We brought our 5 year old and had great service. We had pizza, calzone, and our girl LOVED the Mac and cheese (and this is a kid who is picky)!

name: Robert Johnson

text: I can't believe how amazing the food is every single time here! No joke, this place creates amazing dishes with top notch flavor. The appetizers as well as the pizzas are second to none and I will gladly dine here again, and often. Holy ‚Ä¶More

I should have sued them. All that being said it is under new ownership now, although I will never set foot in that place again.

name: Diane Green

name: Tyler Christie
text: Groovy atmosphere with pizzas well thought out and delicious. Staff has gone out of their way to bring a smile to my face and fast service with every visit. The true appeal here is the staff and pizza. Though, the beer selection is not to be ignored.

name: Mark Abbott
text: Great pizza, good atmosphere, just beware they close early some nights :)
